name: fashion_weak [.dungeon class jam]
description:
[This is a class for the .dungeon class jam by Batts.]

Your joy comes from the amazing spectacles you create from matching gear sets or ensembles from unexpected combinations. The stats of an item are tertiary to how it looks and if you can build a fashionable set to go with it. You cannot choose this class if you are wearing a t-shirt (t-shirt variants such as sleeveless shirts, halter tops, and fashionable shirts in a T cut do not apply. If you already have this class but are wearing a t-shirt now, you receive a -1 to all rolls until you’re wearing something else).

All of my .dungeon class game jam entries:

  • script_kiddie
  • prize_fighter
  • social_butterfly
  • fashion_weak
